support.title: Don't Forget to Show your Support
support.desc:
Upvote CleverBot on Discord Bot List -> https://discordbots.org/bot/458664297732636672
Pledge your support CleverBot on Patreon! -> https://www.patreon.com/thehacker_

Doing this helps keep CleverBot afloat! :)
support.footer: You can disable these reminders with the settings command.

maintenance.title: Maintenance Alert!
maintenance.notice: During the CleverBot server migration, some server data files were deleted. Apologies for the inconvenience!
maintenance.footer: You can disable these alerts with the settings command.
